aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: I am a dedicated medical student with a completed computer science degree and a profound interest in medical research. My academic journey has equipped me with basic medical knowledge and sound computational foundations. I am keen to apply and deepen this knowledge in practice and would like to combine both fields in my future career.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.text: During my time as a student I always wanted to apply my learned skills in practice and thus already gathered some work experience.

education.title: Education
education.text: I finished my high school education in Vienna and then went on to start my academic education in the field of computer science. A few years later I switched to medicine and enrolled at the Medical University of Vienna.
